title: Metadata Document
description: The default SWORD Metadata document allows the deposit of a standard, basic metadata document constructed using the DCMI terms.

@context.title: The JSON-LD Context for this document

@id.title: The URL of the Metadata Document you are looking at

@type.title: JSON-LD identifier for the document type
